name: The city of Awakening
description: The City of Awakening is a shoot' em up. You play as a man named Paul who's wearing a robotic armor. In search of progress, Robots had been given an intelligence, unfortunally after that, they begin to gain consciousness. They started to decimate humanity but little groups of humans managed to hide and stay alived. Your goal is to destroyed the robots to finally live a happy life with your friends. You need to stay focused and reactive despite the stress ; because you need to survive...for humanity.
